title: Option to hide menu strip
author: app/
body_snippet:
<!-- Feature Request -->

To maximize screen space it would be nice to be able to auto hide the Menu Strip at the top (File, View, Tools, Help) and/or be able to place it in line with connection tabs.

comments.author: kmscode
comments.snippet: Honestly, I did look into this every so briefly. I'd like to to something similar to what Firefox does where the menu bar only appears if the alt key is pressed.

comments.author: runguyenhuu
comments.snippet:
Dear Team !

comments.author: majkinetor
comments.snippet:
Please add this. Extra line limits screen space no matter how you make it or simply looks anoyingly ugly.

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/85767/79976221-89ce8880-849c-11ea-871c-f9d334234e49.png)

It could be added on the left toolbar section just like Config and Connections or just havinig a convenient hotkey or as [proposed already](https://github.com/mRemoteNG/mRemoteNG/pull/1332#issuecomment-473525297) in system menu.
